path: artifacts/DFS MAFIA Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.LiquidityGeneratorToken: contracts/DFS MAFIA Full Smart Contract Security Audit/LiquidityGeneratorToken

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function `includeInReward()` may be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: The owner can change the tax and liquidity fee, and exclude from the fee.
